channel.title: Public void help

item.title: Public void help
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

I need help with this code:

public void DragonLongSpecial(){ //by gander for www.rs-server.net if((playerHasItemAmount(6717, 1)==false)) { sendMessage("You need a pet Squid!."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(6717, 1)==true)) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(2861, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false, playerId); } }

can somebody please helpme with this?

Read full topic
